eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A PRACTICE/DEMO WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Dauphin, PA; AT 08:45 AM ON SEP 19, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:45 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: TEST TEST TEST This is a test of the emergency alert system, this is only a test. no action is required.
